summary: Gives Serana a higher tendency to actually use melee/ranged weapons
descriptionHtml:
This is just a quick tweak to Serana\'s combat style. 
===================================================
This is a very simple mod that increases the melee and range combat multiplier slightly while slightly decreasing the multiplier for magic combat. In a gist this means that Serana will be slightly less likely to merely sit back and use vampiric drain/ice spikes and be slightly more likely to pull out her bow and sword.

The changes are very subtle so her combat is still very magic related, this just evens things out a little.
==============================

Requires Dawnguard

Mods shown in the picture include weapons from the Monster Mod by Dogtown1 and Ironman5000 (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35631//?) and the armor from Ghorzas Armor mod by atomec (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36459/?)

==================================
Comment or message me if you have any requests/suggestions!
 Thanks for downloading!
author: Nikguy
